column1: ID System: Total Fiduciary and Related Assets

column2: Title
column4: Definition

column2: Fiduciary Powers Granted
column4: Institution has been granted trust powers by a state or national regulatory authority to administer accounts in a fiduciary capacity. Fiduciary capacity generally means: trustee, executor, administrator, registrar of stocks and bonds, transfer agent, guardian, assignee, receiver, custodian under a uniform gifts to minors act, investment advisor, any capacity in which the institution possesses investment discretion on behalf of another, or any similar capacity. Note:;Domestic offices of foreign banks (a.k.a. IBA’s -- as defined by the International Banking Act) report annually, as of December.; ;All institutions that have any fiduciary or related assets file this information annually each December. However, Quarterly data is ONLY available for institutions that have total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million AND gross fiduciary and related service income greater than 10% of the revenue from the preceding calendar year.;

column2: Fiduciary Power Exercised
column4: Institution or trust company subsidiary of the institution exercises fiduciary powers granted by a state or national regulatory authority to administer accounts in a fiduciary capacity. Fiduciary capacity generally means: trustee, executor, administrator, registrar of stocks and bonds, transfer agent, guardian, assignee, receiver, custodian under a uniform gifts to minors act, investment advisor, any capacity in which the institution possesses investment discretion on behalf of another, or any similar capacity. Note:;Domestic offices of foreign banks (a.k.a. IBA’s -- as defined by the International Banking Act) report annually, as of December.; All institutions that have any fiduciary or related assets file this information annually each December. However, Quarterly data is ONLY available for institutions that have total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million AND gross fiduciary and related service income greater than 10% of the revenue from the preceding calendar year.;

column2: Fiduciary Or Related Activity
column4: Beyond having trust powers granted and exercised, institutions with fiduciary assets accounts, income, or other reportable fiduciary related service. note:;domestic offices of foreign banks (a.k.a. IBA’s -- as defined by the International Banking Act) report annually, as of December.; All institutions that have any fiduciary or related assets file this information annually each December. However, Quarterly data is ONLY available for institutions that have total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million AND gross fiduciary and related service income greater than 10% of the revenue from the preceding calendar year.;

column2: Total Fiduciary and Related Assets
column4: The sum of managed and non-managed assets reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. ris definition: idTFRa = ttma + ttnma

column2: Managed Assets ($)
column4: Total managed assets reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year.

column2: Personal Trust and Agency Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: The market value of personal trust and agency accounts held in managed fiduciary accounts. Includes testamentary trusts, revocable and irrevocable living trusts, other personal trusts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Employee Benefit-Defined Contribution Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: The market value of accounts for all employee benefit defined contribution accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year.li> All others only report in December.

column2: Employee Benefit-Defined Benefit Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: The market value of all employee benefit defined benefit accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Other Employee Benefit and Retirement-Related Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: The market value for all other retirement related fiduciary accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Corporate Trust and Agency Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: The market value of assets held by the institution for all corporate trust and agency accounts held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Investment Management  and investment Advisory Agency Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: The market value of all individual and institutional investment management agency accounts administered within the fiduciary area of the institution, held in managed asset accounts note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Foundation and Endowment Trust and Agency Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: Market Value Of All Institutional Foundations AndEndowments For Which The Institution Serves As EitherTrustee Or Agent That Are Held In Managed Asset Accounts  Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The PriorCalendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: Other Fiduciary Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: The market value of all other trust and agencies not reported in FFIEC Call Report Schedule RC-T line 4 through line 7 and held in managed asset accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Fiduciary Accounts Held in Foreign Offices, Managed Assets
column4: The market value of fiduciary accounts held in foreign offices - managed assets. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: individual Retirement,Health Savings and Similar Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: Market Value Of Individual Retirement Accounts, HealthSavings Accounts And Other Similar Accounts That AreHeld In Managed Asset Accounts (Included In Schedule RC-TItems 5.C And 11)  Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The PriorCalendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: Investments of Managed Fiduciary Accts in Advised Or Sponsored Mutual Funds
column4: Managed Assets Held In Fiduciary Accounts: Market Value Of Managed Fiduciary Accounts In Advised Or Sponsored Mutual Funds  Note:1.) Reported As A Memoranda Item In The December QuarterOnly

column2: Non-Managed Assets ($)
column4: Total non-managed reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year.

column2: Personal Trust and Agency Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value of personal trust and agency accounts held in non-managed fiduciary accounts. Includes testamentary trusts, revocable and irrevocable living trusts, other personal trusts and non-managed personal agency accounts held. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Employee Benefit-Defined Contribution Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value of all employee benefit defined contribution accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in non-managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Employee Benefit-Defined Benefit Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value of all employee benefit defined benefit accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in non-managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Other Retirement Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value for all other retirement related fiduciary accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in non-managed fiduciary accounts note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Corporate Trust and Agency Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value of assets held by the institution for all corporate trust and agency accounts held in non-managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Investment Management and Advisory Agency Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: Market Value Of All Individual And Institutional Investment Management And Investment Advisory Agency Accounts Administered Within The Fiduciary Area Of The Institution, Held In Non-Managed Asset Accounts. Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The Prior Calendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: Foundation and Endowment Trust and Agency Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: Market Value Of All Institutional Foundations AndEndowments For Which The Institution Serves As EitherTrustee Or Agent That Are Held In Non-Managed AssetAccounts. Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The PriorCalendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: Other Fiduciary Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value of all other trust and agencies not reported in FFIEC Call Report Schedule RC-T line 4 through line 7 and held in non-managed asset accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Custody and Safekeeping Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value of personal and institutional custody and safekeeping accounts held by the institution. Safekeeping and custody accounts are a type of agency account in which the reporting institution performs one or more specified agency functions but the institution is not a trustee and also is not responsible for managing the asset selection for account assets note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. all others only report in december.

column2: Fiduciary Accounts Held in Foreign Offices, Non-Managed Assets
column4: The market value of fiduciary accounts held in foreign offices - non-managed assets. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Individual Retirement,Health Savings and Similar Accounts, Non-Managed
column4: Market Value Of Individual Retirement Accounts, HealthSavings Accounts And Other Similar Accounts That AreHeld In Non-Managed Asset Accounts (Included In Schedule RCItems 5.C And 11)  Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The PriorCalendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)
